newsitem.title: UK: LME aluminium steady, copper down in late trade.
newsitem.headline: LME aluminium steady, copper down in late trade.

text.p: LME aluminium was little changed in late inter-office trade, but copper fell further.
At 1800 GMT, three months aluminium was indicated at $1,699/$1,701, compared with a kerb close of $1,701.
Aluminium prices retreated from session highs during Thursday afternoon LME trading, albeit staying firm.
Copper, which had slumped in late kerb business, fell further to an indicated $2,262/$2,267, compared with the kerb close of $2,271.
